Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Halsted
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via: Grand, Halsted, Chicago, Kingsbury, and Grand, due to, street blockage, near Grand/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via:  Grand, Halsted, Chicago, Kingsbury, and Grand, due to, street blockage, near Grand/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.
